title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
**Product Listing: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit**

**Bring STEM Learning Home with This Award-Winning Science Kit**

Unleash your child's curiosity and introduce them to the fascinating world of motors and generators with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit. This comprehensive kit is designed for students in grades 3-6 (ages 8+) and features a range of hands-on experiments that make learning fun and engaging.

**Key Features:**

* Electric motor with transparent plastic, allowing for a clear view of the inner workings
* Battery-powered motor operation and reconfigurable to hand-crank electric generator
* Explore magnetic fields and electric current with our guided experiments
* Build simple circuits and learn about gears and drive-trains
* Develop a deep understanding of energy conversion, including kinetic to electrical and electrical to kinetic

**What's Included:**

* 48-page color student guide with 25 guided experiments
* 60-page full-color manual with detailed instructions and illustrations
* Electric motor with transparent plastic
* Battery-powered motor operation and hand-crank electric generator configurations
* Magnets and other components for experimenting with magnetism and circuits

**Awards and Recognition:**

* Winner of the Parents' Choice Silver Award

**Product Specifications:**

* Dimensions: 13.1 inches (height) x 8.9 inches (width) x 2.6 inches (depth)
* Weight: 1.3 pounds
* Minimum age requirement: 8 years
* Category: Electronic Learning

**Order Now and Watch Your Child's STEM Skills Flourish**

With the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, your child will develop a solid understanding of motors, generators, and energy conversion. This kit is perfect for homeschooling, classroom use, or simply for kids who love to learn and experiment. Order now and watch your child's STEM skills flourish.
